```{r}
library(R.utils)
library(data.table)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)
library(reshape2)
library(raster)
library(tigris)
```

Loading in water use data
```{r}
url <- "https://waterdata.usgs.gov/or/nwis/water_use?format=rdb&rdb_compression=value&wu_area=County&wu_year=ALL&wu_county=065&wu_category=ALL&wu_county_nms=Wasco%2BCounty"

df <- read.table(url, sep = '\t',header = T)
df <- df[-1, ]
```

```{r}
x <- data.frame(t(df[, -5]))
colnames(x) <- df$year
x
```

Collapsing rows
```{r}
#costarSample[costarSample$PropertyType %like% "Office", ]$PropertyType <- "Office"

x$var <- colnames(df)[-5]
x[x$var %like% "Public", ]$var <- "Public"
```
